import axios from"axios";export var GET_INVENTORY_LIST="GET_INVENTORY_LIST";export var GET_INVENTORY_DETAIL="GET_INVENTORY_DETAIL";export var POST_INVENTORY_CREATE="POST_INVENTORY_CREATE";export var PUT_INVENTORY_EDIT="PUT_INVENTORY_EDIT";export var GET_LOGGING_LIST="GET_LOGGING_LIST";export var PUT_LOGGING_EDIT="PUT_LOGGING_EDIT";export var GET_LOGGING_DETAIL="GET_LOGGING_DETAIL";var url="https://smpnapi.herokuapp.com/api/v3/";var header={headers:{Authorization:"JWT ".concat(localStorage.getItem("token"))}};//MUNCULIN LIST DATA INVENTORY
export var getInventoryList=function getInventoryList(){return function(dispatch){axios.get(url+"inventory/",header).then(function(response){console.log(response);dispatch({type:GET_INVENTORY_LIST,payload:{data:response.data.Inventory,errorMessage:false}});}).catch(function(error){dispatch({type:GET_INVENTORY_LIST,payload:{data:false,errorMessage:error.message}});});};};//MUNCULIN LIST DATA LOGGING IN ATAU OUT
export var getLoggingList=function getLoggingList(){return function(dispatch){axios.get(url+"logging/",header).then(function(response){dispatch({type:GET_LOGGING_LIST,payload:{data:response.data.logging,errorMessage:false}});}).catch(function(error){dispatch({type:GET_LOGGING_LIST,payload:{data:false,errorMessage:error.message}});});};};//BUAT DETAIL DATA 1 INVENTORY
export var getInventoryDetail=function getInventoryDetail(logical_uid){return function(dispatch){axios.get(url+"inventory/detail/"+logical_uid,header).then(function(response){console.log(response);dispatch({type:GET_INVENTORY_DETAIL,payload:{data:response.data,errorMessage:false}});}).catch(function(error){dispatch({type:GET_INVENTORY_DETAIL,payload:{data:false,errorMessage:error.message}});});};};export var postInventoryCreate=function postInventoryCreate(data){return function(dispatch){axios.post(url+"inventory/",data,header).then(function(response){console.log(response);dispatch({type:POST_INVENTORY_CREATE,payload:{data:response.data.inventory,errorMessage:false}});}).catch(function(error){dispatch({type:POST_INVENTORY_CREATE,payload:{data:false,errorMessage:error.message}});});};};export var deleteInventory=function deleteInventory(logical_uid){return function(dispatch){axios.delete(url+"inventory/delete/"+logical_uid,header).then(function(response){console.log(response);}).catch(function(error){console.log(error);});};};export var deleteDataInventory=function deleteDataInventory(){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:GET_INVENTORY_DETAIL,payload:{data:false,errorMessage:false}});dispatch({type:POST_INVENTORY_CREATE,payload:{data:false,errorMessage:false}});};};//update inventory
export var putInventoryUpdate=function putInventoryUpdate(data,id){return function(dispatch){axios.put(url+"inventory/update/"+id,data,header).then(function(response){console.log(response);dispatch({type:PUT_INVENTORY_EDIT,payload:{data:response.data,errorMessage:false}});}).catch(function(error){dispatch({type:PUT_INVENTORY_EDIT,payload:{data:false,errorMessage:error.message}});});};};export var deleteLogging=function deleteLogging(id){return function(dispatch){axios.delete(url+"logging/delete/"+id,header).then(function(response){console.log(response);}).catch(function(error){console.log(error);});};};//update logging
export var putLoggingUpdate=function putLoggingUpdate(data,id){return function(dispatch){axios.put(url+"logging/update/"+id,data,header).then(function(response){console.log(response);dispatch({type:PUT_LOGGING_EDIT,payload:{data:response.data,errorMessage:false}});}).catch(function(error){dispatch({type:PUT_LOGGING_EDIT,payload:{data:false,errorMessage:error.message}});});};};//BUAT DETAIL DATA 1 INVENTORY
export var getLoggingDetail=function getLoggingDetail(id){return function(dispatch){axios.get(url+"logging/detail/"+id,header).then(function(response){console.log(response);dispatch({type:GET_LOGGING_DETAIL,payload:{data:response.data,errorMessage:false}});}).catch(function(error){dispatch({type:GET_LOGGING_DETAIL,payload:{data:false,errorMessage:error.message}});});};};
